Reason: The configuration option 'concurrent_materialized_view_writes' in the 'cassandra' software project is performance-sensitive because changing its value can have a significant impact on system performance. Increasing the number of concurrent materialized view writes can lead to increased contention for resources, potentially causing delays in data processing and higher memory consumption. On the other hand, decreasing the number of concurrent writes may improve system performance by reducing resource contention and improving overall throughput.
